name: DeFrag VR
description:
DeFrag is a VR shooter experience for the Oculus Rift.

Prototype for a VR shooter I'm developing solo as part of a college project. Feel free to try it out and provide feedback at the link below.

Questionnaire

Developed for Oculus Rift, but built on the SteamVR framework so it should be compatible with Valve Index and HTC Vive. Should also be compatible with Oculus Quest via a Link cable.
